name: raft (itch) (chiyeon)
description:
raft is an infinite runner about a penguin trying to get home. Stuck underground, he resorts to rafting across treacherous cave rivers, being sure to keep his mysterious cargo safe.

Collect notes to unlock songs. Play them all to win!

raft includes a global leaderboard! Compete against others!

Controls

 - WASD/Arrow Keys - Move Penguin (purely cosmetic)

 - AD/Arrow Keys - Steer Raft
